job_description:
• Experience analyzing and interpreting data, drawing conclusions, defining recommended actions, and reporting results across diverse technical and non-technical groups in a concise and clear manner Identify project requirements, develop timelines and business processes, and hold collaborators accountable for deliverables to meet project objectives Experience turning sophisticated and ambiguous problem statements into structured solutions while working in a highly multi-functional environment Sophisticated data extraction, analysis, and reporting/data visualization skills (SQL, Python, Tableau, PowerBI, etc.
• ) Experience managing, prioritizing, and completing multiple multi-functional projects in parallel and on time Experience operating independently while maintaining a high degree of organization and control Sophisticated skills in AutoCAD.
• Intermediate skills in Revit, Navisworks, and BIM 360 2+ years of experience in a layout planning role ​ Bachelor's OR Master's degree in Engineering Collaborate with local and global collaborators to research alternative technical solutions, and develop processes and associated business rules, to address critical/major layout planning issues.
